name: FxVersioningAPI
desc: A collection of methods that a host application implements to identify the plug-in version used by a project when it was first created.

items.name: func versionAtCreation() -> UInt32
items.desc: Provides the version number of a plug-in that a project uses.

items.name: func updateVersion(atCreation: UInt32) -> Bool
items.desc: Updates the version of the plug-in that was stored when the plug-in was added to the clip.
